text: "Duality" is a song by Slipknot. Slipknot is an American heavy metal band. The song was released as a single in 2004. It is on the band's third album, Vol. 3: (The Subliminal Verses). It was the first single from the album. The song has a music video. The song was number 15 on the UK Singles Chart. It was number 6 on the Billboard Alternative Airplay chart. It went on music charts in other countries, such as France, Belgium, Italy and the Netherlands. The British Phonographic Industry (BPI) gave the song a platinum certification. ==References== Category:2004 songs Category:Slipknot songs Category:Hard rock songs
title: Duality (song)
